summary: Scrape and control any site with Airtop.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (extraction, file, interaction, session, window).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: profile name
parameters.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create.

parameters.name: save profile on termination
parameters.description: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination.

parameters.name: idle timeout
parameters.description: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity.

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session.

parameters.name: proxy configuration
parameters.description: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy.
